summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JABA DRIVER VTC booking application premium dark design refonte. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend features working perfectly. Premium dark theme, French phone validation, date validation, mobile sticky button, admin interface, and all integrations functioning correctly.
passed_tests: Premium dark design (#0a0a0a background) implemented correctly
JABA DRIVER logo visible in header and favicon
Hero section with 3 badges (Ponctualité, Confort, Prix clair) with blue accent (#7dd3fc)
Form in light card (card-light class) with proper styling and labels above fields
French phone validation (tested multiple formats: 0612345678, 06 12 34 56 78, +33612345678, 0033612345678)
Invalid phone rejection (123, abcdef, 1234567890, +1234567890, 06123)
Date/time validation preventing past dates and times
Future date acceptance working correctly
Mobile responsive design with JABA DRIVER text hidden on mobile
Mobile sticky button positioned at bottom and functional
Desktop submit button hidden on mobile, mobile button hidden on desktop
Booking form submission and navigation to confirmation page
Confirmation page with 'On vous confirme rapidement par téléphone' message
Confirmation card with reservation details and reference ID
Admin login page with dark theme (card-dark styling)
Admin authentication with correct password (Vtc!Admin2026#Secure)
Admin dashboard with dark theme and statistics cards
Reservations list with proper status colors (nouvelle=blue, confirmée=green, effectuée=gray, annulée=rouge)
Status change functionality working
Call client buttons with tel: links
Google Maps itinéraire buttons functional
Search functionality by name/phone
Date and status filters working
CSV export button visible and functional
Refresh and logout functionality
All 13 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Proper error handling and validation responses

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All premium design features and validations working)
success_percentage.admin: 100% (Dark theme interface and all functionality working)
